snippet: Lois Kirschenbaum, 79, shows up nightly for opera and ballet performances, determinedly getting into the show on the cheap and often meeting the performers by the stage door afterward.
abstract: Corey Kilgannon Character Study column profiles 79-year-old Lois Kirschenbaum, New York City's longest-standing opera and ballet buff; Kirschenbaum has been showing up nightly to performances at one New York venue or another since the early 1950s.
lead_paragraph: Lois Kirschenbaum, 79, shows up nightly for opera and ballet performances, determinedly getting into the show on the cheap and often meeting the performers by the stage door afterward.

headline.seo: Lois Kirschenbaum, 79, Art Buff and Queen of the Nosebleed Seats
